components.name: uIGuiD

components.content:
In this section, we'll ask you to:

  • confirm your emerging local plan is at Regulation 18 stage (as of 14 February 2025)
  • agree to submit your plan by the deadline set out in the National Planning Policy Framework (by December 2026)
  • agree to respond to MHCLG’s requests to submit an updated local plan timetable (Local Development Scheme or LDS) to MHCLG by 6 March 2025
  • agree to provide regular updates on your progress against milestones
  • commit to have proposals in place by March 2025 on how you will spend the funding
  • agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements
  • confirm your section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, supports this submission
components.name: LTyOhV
